I am a Senior Undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur majoring in Computer Science and Engineering graduating in Dec. 2021. My research interests are broadly in the areas of Multi Agent Systems, Reinforcement Learning, Game Theory and Behavioral Models, Decision Making under Uncertainty and Robust Optimization.

Currently I am a visiting researcher at Singapore Management University working with Prof.Arunesh Sinha, Prof. Pradeep Varakantham and Prof. Main Ahn Tien. I will be joining SMU as a Graduate Research Engineer in Jan. 2022.

Previosuly, I worked with Prof.Piyush Rai at IIT Kanpur on continuous time generative models and Prof.Soumendu Sundar Mukherjee at Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata on change point detection in topic models.

Please head over to my CV for more details on my publications and other projects.
